name: Universe Sandbox Data File
summary: Learn about .UBOX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: UBOX files are .ZIP files renamed with the ".ubox" extension. The compressed file contains XML data that specifies the parameters of the simulation.

description: Saved data file created by Universe Sandbox, an interactive astronomy application; saves a simulation through space and can include planets, stars, moons, man-made objects, orbital motions, and other simulated data; used for sharing and playing back universe explorations.
